rows.label: qst100502_msg0001
rows.name: Hmm!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0002
rows.name: Oooh... Saw it...?

rows.label: qst100502_msg0003
rows.name: Try your luck?

rows.label: qst100502_msg0004
rows.name: No-brains will be no good though.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0005
rows.name: Read! Read!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0101
rows.name: Do again.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0110
rows.name: Come back again?

rows.label: qst100502_msg0111
rows.name: Try your luck?

rows.label: qst100502_msg0201
rows.name: Passed. Good. Big rubber stamp.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0202
rows.name: Not stupid. This good.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0203
rows.name: Congratulations. Friend have job.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0204
rows.name: Hereby name you Rododo's helper.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0205
rows.name: Now your duties.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0206
rows.name:
Go to upper level of here. Open door,
see inside. Tell Rododo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0207
rows.name:
Avaritia person cannot open door.
Many tried. All failed.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0208
rows.name:
Details are mystery. So open door.
Then truth revealed.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0209
rows.name: Origin of us.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0210
rows.name: Hehe.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0211
rows.name: But! Not have key.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0212
rows.name:
Don't know location of key.
Helper must find.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0213
rows.name: Begin duties!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0301
rows.name:
Open door on upper level.
See inside.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0302
rows.name:
Not have key.
Helper find key.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0401
rows.name: Hello, helper. Give Rododo report.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0402
rows.name:
Helper's duty was see inside door on
upper level.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0403
rows.name: Deliver Rododo report on findings.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0501
rows.name: Hello, helper. Give Rododo report.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0502
rows.name:
So! Helper saw statue of Nopon with
eyepatch and funny hat.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0503
rows.name:
That must be...
Captain Nopopon!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0504
rows.name:
Captain Nopopon!
Legendary Nopon Pirate!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0521
rows.name:
Traces of Captain Nopopon! In such a
place! Woowee!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0522
rows.name:
Ahem.
Sorry for outburst.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0523
rows.name:
So. Stomach indentations.
Round one and square one.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0524
rows.name:
Probably, need two different parts.
One for each indentation.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0525
rows.name: Helper find them, fit them in.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0601
rows.name:
Find circle part. Find square part.
Put parts in stomach indentations.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0602
rows.name:
Not know location of parts.
Helper find.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0701
rows.name: Hello, helper. Give Rododo report.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0702
rows.name:
Helper's duty was fit parts into stone
statue.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0703
rows.name: Deliver Rododo report on findings.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0801
rows.name: Hello, helper. Give Rododo report.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0802
rows.name: Location: Hr√¶svelgr.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0803
rows.name: Go. Investigate.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0804
rows.name:
Hehe...
Getting closer...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0901
rows.name: Hello, helper. Give Rododo report.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0902
rows.name:
Gaudy box of precious things.
Captain Nopopon's logbook.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0903
rows.name:
You can have gaudy things.
Just show logbook to Rododo!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0904
rows.name:
Hmmm ponponpon....
Uhmm ponponpon...?!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0905
rows.name:
This...
Waa! Woowee!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0906
rows.name:
This book written in unusual
combination of ancient and modern
Nopon!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0907
rows.name:
If Rododo decipher this...will be able to
read ancient Nopon writing on stone
statue!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0908
rows.name: Ahem. Very exciting.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0909
rows.name: Investigate statue. Helper come too.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0910
rows.name: Quick! Quick! Helper, hurry!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1001
rows.name: Rododo has deciphered.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1002
rows.name:
This statue constructed by ancient
Nopon to remember Captain Nopopon.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1003
rows.name:
Rododo performed careful analyze
of statue and logbook...

rows.label: qst100502_msg1004
rows.name:
Findings reveal incredible surprising
thing about history of Nopon!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1005
rows.name:
Ancient Nopon people...talk in erudite
and grammatically-correct language!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1006
rows.name:
Rododo was very shocked.
Old Nopon writings sound just like
posh and educated human talk!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1007
rows.name: But also discover more things.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1008
rows.name:
Rododo will read from logbook of
Captain Nopopon. Helper, listen!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1009
rows.name:
"I am weary, so weary of the long fight
for treasure and riches. But I have
hit upon a solution."

rows.label: qst100502_msg1010
rows.name:
"It seems that the Non-Nopon people
take us for charming, harmless little
balls of fluff."

rows.label: qst100502_msg1011
rows.name:
"I propose we use this perception to
our advantage in diplomacy, in order to
create a new era of Nopon domination!"

rows.label: qst100502_msg1012
rows.name:
"Furthermore, I suggest that we use silly
sounding, grammatically imprecise
sentences. This makes us even cuter."

rows.label: qst100502_msg1013
rows.name:
"Henceforth, I will fluff my fur,
make myself sound extremely silly..."

rows.label: qst100502_msg1014
rows.name:
"And build big-big good Guild of
Trading! For glory of all Nopon!
Mo-mo-mo!"

rows.label: qst100502_msg1015
rows.name: That end of logbook entry.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1016
rows.name:
Indeed! Captain Nopopon make Nopon
speech what it is today! He father of
modern Nopon-speak! Woowee!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1017
rows.name:
Ahem.
This really very big deal.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1018
rows.name:
Helper. Thank you.
Th-thank you friends very much!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1019
rows.name:
This amazing discovery! Will rewrite
history books of Nopon people!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1020
rows.name:
Like Captain Nopopon say. Nopon must
be cute. This Nopon way.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1021
rows.name:
Mystery of the door all solve anyway,
so Rododo give up on trying to talk
all stoic and cool like!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1022
rows.name:
Woowee! Wait till Rododo tell
everybody!
